mdRecord.dcterms:title: Document, "Memorandum of the Division of Slaves of the Late Lawrence Washington Esq.,", 1754 December 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George,1732-1799
Lee, Ann
Lee, George
Washington, Augustine,1718?-1762
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This document divides Lawrence Lewis' slaves between Col. George Lee and the brothers of Lawrence Washington. It is signed by G. Washington, George Lee, Ann Lee, and Aug. Washington. Witnessed by William Fairfax, George William Fairfax, Robert Merrie, John Dalton, Thomas Plummer, John Tuberville, John Carlyle, Sarah Carlyle, and Bryan Fairfax. The deed was admitted to record in the County of Fairfax on 1755 June 17. Autograph document signed, 3 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, Lawrence, 1718-1752--Estate
Slaves
